title: OXO Grout Brush
description: Tackle your bathroom's tough grout lines and tight spaces with the OXO Good Grips Grout Brush. Featuring narrow rows of sturdy bristles, the Brush eliminates grime from tile grout, around bath fixtures, behind faucets and in sliding shower door tracks. The handle has a soft, comfortable, non-slip grip to cushion hand while scrubbing.

asset.title: OXO Grout Brush
asset.description:
http://www.oxo.com/p-336-grout-brush.aspx

Tackle your bathroom's tough grout lines and tight spaces with the OXO Good Grips Grout Brush. Featuring narrow rows of sturdy bristles, the Brush eliminates grime from tile grout, around bath fixtures, behind faucets and in sliding shower door tracks. The handle has a soft, comfortable, non-slip grip to cushion hand while scrubbing.
asset.author: OXO

transcripts: At OXO we created a group of cleaning brushes that are designed for very specific house hold tasks so the end result is always sparkling clean. The OXO grout brush is perfect for cleaning grout, shower door tracks, fixtures and other small spaces. The tough bristles easily scrub away mildew, grime, and soap scum while the soft comfortable non slip handle provides a secure grip even when wet. Here's a good tip. Try using this brush to clean off muddy sneakers and cleats after a wet soccer game.
